instructions: # Shadows Of Esteren Character Sheet.## Very rudementary but with some basic automation## Fill out Player's Health Condition like it would be a NPC with X(G)Y(O)Z(B)V(C) system.## Potential base value is automatically calculated whenever you change Creativity.## Condition Penalty is automatically calculated whenever Player's Health Condition changes and is automatically added to the rolls ((make sure character sheets are open for automatic penalty calculation).
